name: Tenkiwi
description:
Tenkiwi is a platform for playing zero-prep storytelling games with friends - either in the same room or online via something like Zoom.  The majority of gameplay is prompt based, each player taking a turn to answer a prompt on a card or pass it to another player. 

Currently it supports two games, but the ability to easily add and build more using the same rules via spreadsheets is included, in case others would like to host their Descended from the Queen game or try out the expanded rules of Culinary Contest. 

This work is based on For the Queen , product of Alex Roberts and Evil Hat Productions, and licensed for our use under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license.
